Stage I Wilms Tumor
		                    Treatment of stage I Wilms tumor with favorable histology may include:         -  Nephrectomy with removal of lymph nodes, followed by combination chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of nephrectomy only.        Treatment of stage I anaplastic Wilms tumor may include:         - Nephrectomy with removal of lymph nodes followed by combination chemotherapy and radiation therapy to the flank area (either side of the body between
